name: Helix Survivae
description:
Helix Survivae

Name is inspired by the nomenclature of a lot of common snails.

This is my entry for the Lazy-Devs 24h game jam that has been hosted on April 10 2021.

As the competition required, it's a console-based game.

Controls:

  • [Arrows] -> movement
  • [W] -> Place walls (walls are indestructible, but you cannot walk through them)
  • [D] -> Place doors (doors have a 33% of getting destroyed on impact, but you can walk through them while enemies cannot)
  • [X] -> Place a trap (traps damage anything that walk into them, including you. When an enemy makes contact with one, there's a 50% chance it will destroy the trap)
  • [Space] -> Break things around you, useful when in an awkward situation

note: for some reasons Windows Defender is causing a lot of issues with the game and its performances, I'm not sure why, sorry about that.
